channel.title: [Outdated] Accusing the King
channel.description:
####What happened?
Accused the King and the whole game crashes
####What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The King would so the usual as anyone else, explain their reasons to why they are not cult or Blue Dragon
####Steps to reproduce:
Voted for the King, and the FPS would go down to 2 and then the whole game will slowly begin to crash
####Comments:
